title: Covid-19 Vaccine Makers Say There Are Enough Doses for Everyone. Poor Countries Are Still Waiting for Shots.
content:
1. Covid-19 Vaccine Makers Say There Are Enough Doses for Everyone. Poor Countries Are Still Waiting for Shots.  The Wall Street Journal
  2. DeKalb County hosts COVID vaccine event  11Alive
  3. Australia reports 2,357 new COVID-19 cases as vaccination push continues  Reuters Australia
  4. News Wrap: California to mandate COVID vaccine for schoolchildren  PBS NewsHour
  5. Morocco Introduces Third COVID-19 'Booster' Vaccine Dose  Morocco World News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Covid-19 ワクチンメーカーは「誰にでも十分な量を投与できる」と言っている。貧しい国ではまだ注射を待っている。
Covid-19疫苗制造商称有足够的剂量供所有人使用。贫困国家仍在等待注射。
Covid-19疫苗製造商稱有足夠的劑量供所有人使用。貧困國家仍在等待注射。
